SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthHeadersFilter
Servlet filter responsible for extracting authentication headers (e.g., X-Auth-Username, X-Auth-Roles) from incoming HTTP requests and storing them as request attributes.
ClientController
Controller class for handling client-side requests in the MicroDiab application.
ClientuiApplication
Main application class for the *ClientUI* microservice in the *MicroDiab* project.
CustomErrorDecoder
Custom implementation of ErrorDecoder for Feign clients.
CustomInfoContributor
The CustomInfoContributor class is a Spring component that dynamically enriches the information exposed by the /actuator/info endpoint.
FeignConfig
Configuration class for Feign clients in the MicroDiab application.
FeignExceptionConfig
Configuration class for custom Feign exception handling in the MicroDiab application.
FeignExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for FeignException in the ClientUI application.
FilterConfig
Configuration class for custom filters in the MicroDiab application.
HeaderAuthenticationFilter
Spring Security filter that authenticates users based on custom HTTP headers (X-Auth-Username and X-Auth-Roles).
LocalDateFormatterCustom
Configuration class for custom date formatting in the MicroDiab application.
MicroservicesProxy
Feign client interface for communicating with backend microservices in the MicroDiab application.
NoteBean
Bean class representing a Note object in the *MicroDiab* project.
PatientBean
Bean class representing a Patient object in the *MicroDiab* project.
RiskLevelBean
Bean class representing a RiskLevel object in the *MicroDiab* project.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for Spring Security in the ClientUI application.
TracingHelper
Helper class for managing tracing spans and tags in a Spring Boot application.
ValidationErrorDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing validation errors.
WebConfig
Configuration class for customizing Spring MVC web configuration.
